articles.title: UK PM Sunak reportedly said 'just let people die', COVID inquiry hears - Reuters UK
articles.description: Prime Minister Rishi Sunak was quoted as saying the government should "just let people die" during the COVID-19 pandemic rather than impose a second national lockdown, the inquiry into how Britain handled the crisis heard on Monday.
